title: Rationally Speaking #132 - Live From NECSS 2015
description: This live episode of Rationally Speaking, taped at the 2015 Northeast Conference on Science and Skepticism, is a special one: it's Massimo's last episode as co-host! He and Julia look back over their history together and discuss which topics they've changed their mind about since the podcast began.

He and Julia look back over their history together and discuss which topics they've changed their mind about since the podcast began.
